channel.title: Blackbutt on The Miette
channel.description: Recent content in Blackbutt on The Miette

item.title: June 2022 Build Update
item.description: A June build update Decided that we should do monthly build updates as we march towards the end of the year. We’re hoping to reach lock up by then (walls, floor and roof complete) and 31st December is our D-day. Table Of Contents What we’ve done Challenges What’s next? What we’ve done Erny bought a second hand table saw for $400 a few months back and it’s been an absolute workhorse.
